title: Why Paris is Totally Overrated (But You Should Go Anyway)
excerpt: I went to Paris to find love. I found a 15 Euro croissant and a pigeon that attacked me. Here's why you need to experience the chaos.
content: Everyone says Paris is the city of love...

title: My 'Spiritual Awakening' in Bali (I Just Got a Tan)
excerpt: I did yoga once and drank a coconut. Does this mean I'm enlightened now? A brutally honest review of the digital nomad life.
content: I went to Bali to find myself...

title: I Ate Sushi from a Gas Station So You Don't Have To
excerpt: Spoiler alert: It was a bad idea. A very, very bad idea. Read about my 24 hours of regret.

title: Surviving the Ring Road: Iceland on a Budget
excerpt: Waterfalls, glaciers, and $30 sandwiches. How to see the land of fire and ice without going bankrupt.
content: Iceland is beautiful, but my wallet is still crying...

title: Hiking the Dolomites: Views That Ruined My Knees
excerpt: The peaks are jagged, the lakes are blue, and my legs have stopped working. Was it worth it? Absolutely.
content: The Dolomites are not for the faint of heart...

title: Lost in Tokyo: Eating My Way Through Shinjuku
excerpt: From Yakitori Alley to convenience store egg sandwiches. Tokyo is a food lover's paradise (and a waistline's nightmare).
content: The lights, the crowds, the smell of charcoal...

title: Driving the Amalfi Coast: A Near-Death Experience
excerpt: Beautiful views, terrible drivers, and a bus that nearly pushed me off a cliff. The romance of Italy comes with high stakes.
content: They don't tell you about the honking...
